description:
A free, reliable solution for getting a current or hourly weather forecast directly in bubble.

⁉️ Demo available here 👉🏽 https://national-weather-service.bubbleapps.io/version-test

View the editor 👉🏽 https://bubble.io/page?name=index&id=national-weather-service

There is only one caveat! 

Since this is a public services provided by the US 🇺🇸 it will only have weather data for the US.

If that's all you need, you're good.

✅ Free
✅ Reliable
✅ No limits
name: National Weather Service
plugin_instructions:
If you need the current forecast for a location:


🏃‍♀️ Run the 'Get Current Weather' action
👍🏻 Use the data returned by the action

If you need the closest forecast for a specific location + date in the future:

🏃‍♀️ Run the 'Get Closest Weather' action
👍🏻 Use the data returned by the action
⚠️ Date must be within 5 days from now

Demo available here 👉🏽 https://national-weather-service.bubbleapps.io/version-test
